channel.title: Wolf Vostell on Artangled

item.title: Wolf Vostell: Destruction is Life | Cardi Gallery
item.description: There are two impressive mini-retrospectives for members of the post-war Fluxus group - some of the original performance artists - on in London at the moment. Per Kirkeby’s dark landscape paintings are at Michael Werner, while Wolf Vostell, one of the movement’s leading lights, has taken over all three floors of the large Cardi Gallery. Vostell specialised in what he called décollages - mixed media collages, built through creating new things and destroying existing ones.
